body.name: Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo, X9 Performance Small Full Size Wireless Mouse and Keyboard Combo - 20% Smaller Cordless Keyboard and Mouse Set to Save Space for Windows, Laptop, Computer, Desktop, PC
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 10 hrs 29 mins
features: (20% Smaller | 100% Functionality): Save space without sacrificing functionality. Our cordless keyboard and mouse combo is a great solution for smaller workspaces or minimalistic setups.

(Connectivity You Can Rely On): The wireless keyboard with mouse set is equipped with 2.4Ghz technology that offers a reliable 30ft range. Simply plug the single USB-A RF dongle into your PC or Chromebook.

(An Ergonomic and Versatile Layout That Does It All): Don't let the 20% reduction in size fool you. The small keyboard in our wireless mouse keyboard combo has 102 keys featuring 16 shortcuts and a 17-key numeric keypad for maximum productivity.

(Simple Point and Click): Equipped with a 1200 DPI optical sensor for smooth control, basic 3 button layout, and ambidextrous body, the optical mouse in the keyboard and mouse combo wireless is easy to use and comfortable.

(What You'll Receive): Your satisfaction is valued tremendously. Therefore, along with the compact keyboard and mouse wireless set, you will receive lifetime support, free returns, and up to 2 years of warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a compact keyboard that will fit in my laptop case so my search was limited to this size. I was really pleased that although it was compact it was it is a full keyboard with number pad. setup was very easy, just plugged it in and it worked instantily, no dirver install or updates. As far as the function, I fee no delays or dropped or repeat keys when typing and I do like the feel of the keyboard. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for great price
reviews.reviewText: Best keyboard and mouse for a very good price. It connected very easily to my Mac and the feel of the keyboard and mouse is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You got long nails?
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for keyboard that would work with my long acrylic nails. Well this one did it for me! I like that it has the popped up keys, it’s compact, the mouse is silent, and it has one USB for both the keyboard and mouse.Cons: I hate the placement of the zero on the number keypad, the USB is infrared so sometimes the mouse doesn’t work so well (Especially while highlighting).Overall I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a smallish pull-out tray on my computer desk. This smaller keyboard fits perfectly & works well. My only complaint is that the price has been reduced by a couple of dollars since I bought mine. Oh well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice keyboard if you don't care about numpad EDIT: Vendor replaced keyboard at no cost to me!
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this keyboard but the numpad is not working correctly. I can't type 7 and 9.EDIT: Jukegear replaced the keyboard with a new one at no charge to me. Great customer service! Changed rating to 5 stars 8/17/22

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mouse is not functioning l.
reviews.reviewText: I like the keyboard because is good size and quiet keys but the mouse is not functioning correctly and slow response. At the end I only use keyboard and throw away the mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Most silent mouse and keyboard is one of the most quiet ones I’ve had. The mouse and keyboard come with batteries which was a pleasant surprise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It is compact and concise but does not recognize the words or commands. You are typing and half of the letters are missing. Any command feature is impossible to complete. This really is the worse product i have ever purchased.
